definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: Recently I’ve been listening to an audiobook about the history of Google.
sentences.chinese: 最近我在听有关谷歌历史的有声书。

sentences.english: Books on tape also pose a time problem.
sentences.chinese: 有声书还带来了时间的问题。

sentences.english: There are a lot of fantastic audiobooks out there.
sentences.chinese: 绝妙的有声书数不胜数。

sentences.english: The materials can include audio books, songs, radio, movies or TV.
sentences.chinese: 可用材料包括有声书，歌曲，广播，电影或者电视。

sentences.english: This is an illustrated audio book for children.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本图文并茂的童话绘本有声书。

sentences.english: Do you have any other free audio book site to add to the list?
sentences.chinese: 你还有什么其它的免费有声书网站加入这个列表吗？

sentences.english: The learners can then listen to the audio books through their earphones.
sentences.chinese: 学习者可以通过耳机听有声书本上的内容。

sentences.english: Audio books will not only offer them entertainment, but improve their literacy too.
sentences.chinese: 有声书本不仅娱乐他们，也改进了他们的识字能力。

sentences.english: This is only possible in the world of audio books.
sentences.chinese: 在有声书本的世界里，一切皆有可能。

sentences.english: This is another great resource for downloading audio books.
sentences.chinese: 这是另一个下载有声书的好资源。

definition: audiobook/recording of a person reading the text of a book
to listen to stories/to listen to performance of 說書|说书 storytelling
to broadcast a lecture, a book reading etc
books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
